channel.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
channel.description: > # Possessor > **Neutral Killer** > Passive 1: Black Shield - Immune to death at night > Passive 2: Mimicry - You have the passives of the player you currently are possessing unless it has an effect that triggers on execution or an effect that changes your own class > > Day Ability 1: Mind Control - Force your first target to vote for your second. They cannot vote for the rest of the day (2 uses) > Day Ability 2: Mind reading - See whispers to and from target player for the rest of the day (2 uses) > > Night Ability 1: Puppet Strings - Kill target player. Your first target will appear to attack them instead of you and you will see their night results. (Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Possess - Kill target player and choose a class. You will take control of their body and your old body will appear as the chosen class. If successful you may read the possessed players logs and you will heal yourself. You will also learn their class. Otherwise regain the use. Bypasses healing (3 uses)

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I readded poss bypassing healing and removed the occ ability thing.

Moved whisper reading to a day ability with 2 uses.

Gave possess 3 uses.

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Alternatively I can readd possess bypassing healing. I honestly forgot why I removed that in the first place

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Currently it does. This one doesn’t

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
No counterplay to healers? But possess currently bypasses healing

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Made mind read a part of puppet strings and gave poss an occupy. I realized that Poss had no counterplay to healers as is, and while having him he weak to them is fine, he shouldn’t be helpless

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
K, I would probably still nerf mindread to 2

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
back-to-Firekitten:

Doesn’t this mean that knight now kills him as well?

No. The interaction is the same as now just without the whisper reading

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I was forced to do this by nuke
]

NuclearBurrito:

Passive 1: Black Shield - Immune to death at night
Passive 2: Mimicry - You have the passives of the player you currently are possessing unless it has an effect that triggers on execution or an effect that changes your own class

Both of these are good, I expect possessors to probably jump into physicians for bleed immunity.

NuclearBurrito:

Day Ability 1: Mind Control - Force your first target to vote for your second. They cannot vote for the rest of the day (2 uses)
Day Ability 2: Mind Read - You will see the night results of the player you control or possess tonight (3 uses)

These are both good. I would maybe nerf mindread to 2 uses? It could be fine with 3 though.

NuclearBurrito:

Night Ability 1: Puppet Strings - Kill target player. Your first target will appear to attack them instead of you (Unlimited)
Night Ability 2: Possess - Kill target player and choose a class. You will take control of their body and your old body will appear as the chosen class. If successful you may read the possessed players logs and whispers and you will heal yourself. You will also learn their class. Otherwise regain the use. (2 uses)

Doesn’t this mean that knight now kills him as well? I think it’s good but overall maybe nerf some spots and make it so knight doesn’t kill him

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Lightsin:

So to recap, Possessor seems more like is Possessee, and Facelift becomes merged with Possess

And instead of PS giving whispers, Possess is just a retroactive whisper check

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Lightsin:

Also what about the people with no passives?

What ABOUT them?

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
after holding out against some mafia that wants to rob your bank, you see something coming from heaven… you hear it’s words as many maf members start screaming and running.

LMG MOUNTED AND LOADED!

NuclearBurrito:

Black Shield - Immune to death at night

sleeps

NuclearBurrito:

Mimicry - You have the passives of the player you currently are possessing (doesn’t work on poor fellow or apprentice)

Insert pikachu shocked meme

Also what about the people with no passives?

NuclearBurrito:

Mind Control - Force your first target to vote for your second. They cannot vote for the rest of the day (2 uses)

Oh noes

NuclearBurrito:

Mind Read - You will see the night results of the player you control or possess tonight (3 uses)

That’s cool. Now I don’t need to make up a random result and die

NuclearBurrito:

Puppet Strings - Kill target player. Your first target will appear to attack them instead of you (Unlimited)

sleeps again

NuclearBurrito:

Kill target player and choose a class. You will take control of their body and your old body will appear as the chosen class. If successful you may read the possessed players logs and whispers and you will heal yourself. You will also learn their class. Otherwise regain the use. (2 uses)

Wording is kinda confusing, but seems like regular possess combined with Facelift

So to recap, Possessor seems more like is Possessee, and Facelift becomes merged with Possess

seems legit

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
RHCube:

Seems good. Did you make possess no longer bypass healing on purpose or did you forget to add it?

On purpose

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Seems good. Did you make possess no longer bypass healing on purpose or did you forget to add it?(Not that I’m against it). And black shield should clarify “immune to death at night”. I’m pretty sure that’s what other immunities say

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor Changes (by Nuke)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Possessor

Neutral Killer
Passive 1: Black Shield - Immune to death at night
Passive 2: Mimicry - You have the passives of the player you currently are possessing unless it has an effect that triggers on execution or an effect that changes your own class

Day Ability 1: Mind Control - Force your first target to vote for your second. They cannot vote for the rest of the day (2 uses)
Day Ability 2: Mind reading - See whispers to and from target player for the rest of the day (2 uses)

Night Ability 1: Puppet Strings - Kill target player. Your first target will appear to attack them instead of you and you will see their night results. (Unlimited)
Night Ability 2: Possess - Kill target player and choose a class. You will take control of their body and your old body will appear as the chosen class. If successful you may read the possessed players logs and you will heal yourself. You will also learn their class. Otherwise regain the use. Bypasses healing (3 uses)

Read full topic
